  <title type="text">New Features, Changes, Fixes!</title>
  <content type="html">Our developers, with some assistance from a student team at <a href="http://www.swin.edu.au">Swinburne University</a> have updated the site with some major changes, and a taste of what is to come.<br /><br />Summary of changes:<br /><ul><br /><li>Users can now <span style="font-weight: bold;">compare</span> records, and <span style="font-weight: bold;">highlight</span> their similarities/differences.</li><br /><li>Registered users have access to a personal <span style="font-weight: bold;">User Space</span> page. Currently this page gives you access to a <span style="font-weight: bold;">log</span> of your most recent comparisons, quick searches, and also gives you a <span style="font-weight: bold;">personal notepad</span> for recording anything you desire.</li><br /><li>The home page displays articles from a <span style="font-weight: bold;">PubMed</span> search on the term 'refolding', and shows how many entries in the refold database an article relates to.</li><br /><li><span style="font-weight: bold;">Depositing data</span> is made simpler, with validation removed on several fields.</li><br /><li>The latest <span style="font-weight: bold;">news</span> on the development of Refold is displayed on the home page.</li><br /><li>Fixed a bug that occurred when viewing multiple pages worth of results.</li><br /></ul></content>
